text: Sutaram tadera pratyekake'i amara tara aparadhera jan'ya pakara'o karechilama. Tadera karo upara amara pathiyechilama patharakucisampanna pracanda jhatika [1], tadera ka'uke aghata karechila mahanada, ka'uke amara prothita karechilama bhugarbhe ebam ka'uke amara karechilama nimajjita. Ara allaha emana nana ye, tini tadera prati yuluma karabena; baram tara nijera'i nijedera prati juluma karechila
